## Current position

Post-Doctoral researcher at [UMR Géographie-cités](https://geographie-cites.cnrs.fr) and [Deezer](www.deezer.com) [Research Team](https://research.deezer.com/), within the [RECORDS](https://records.huma-num.fr/) project.

## Bio

Robin Cura is a Doctor in Geography, with a PhD thesis focused on quantitative geography, agent-based modelling and spatial data visualization.
With a geographical information engineering scholarship, he's interested in the development and dissemination of quantitative methods for geographic data science and to the use of exploratory and visual spatial-data analysis.

## Education

**Université Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne** | Paris, France

- Ph.D. in Geography within the [Géographie-cités research lab](https://geographie-cites.cnrs.fr) | 2013 - 2020 <br>
[Thesis (in french)](https://tel.archives-ouvertes.fr/tel-02944405) : "Interdisciplinary modelling of settlement systems through the collective : co-construction and visual analysis of a simulation model"

- Master Carthagéo : Geography, GIScience and Cartography | 2008 - 2011
